sys_variable_value.value:
In addition to submitting this ticket, please take the following actions to ensure full processing of the transfer.

 

Departing company:

  • Enter the employee’s transfer date and enter code Company to Company Transfer (T) in your HR/Payroll system.
  • Follow your separation steps in terms of gathering work equipment and updating their personnel record.
  • Do NOT submit a Termination Request in APi Connect. The Intercompany Transfer Request form is all that is needed to initiate changes to their IT record, email and current business system access (AX, WebApps, etc.).

 

Hiring company:

  • Enter the employee’s transfer date as their hire date in your HR/Payroll system AND record their original hire date in your system. The original hire date is necessary for benefit eligibility and vesting (PTO, 401(k), Profit Sharing etc.).
  • Follow your onboarding steps in terms of getting work equipment, establishing their new personnel record and welcoming them to your company.
  • Do NOT submit a New Hire Request in APi Connect. The Intercompany Transfer Request form is all that is needed to initiate changes to their IT record and email.
  • If they need new access to business systems (AX, WebApps, etc.) please submit those access requests via APi Connect – Software & Access.

sys_variable_value.value:
In addition to submitting this ticket, please take the following actions to ensure full processing of the transfer.

 

Departing company:

  • Enter the employee’s transfer date and enter code Company to Company Transfer (T) in your HR/Payroll system.
  • Follow your separation steps in terms of gathering work equipment and updating their personnel record.
  • Do NOT submit a Termination Request in APi Connect. The Intercompany Transfer Request form is all that is needed to initiate changes to their IT record, email and current business system access (AX, WebApps, etc.).

 

Hiring company:

  • Enter the employee’s transfer date as their hire date in your HR/Payroll system AND record their original hire date in your system. The original hire date is necessary for benefit eligibility and vesting (PTO, 401(k), Profit Sharing etc.).
  • Follow your onboarding steps in terms of getting work equipment, establishing their new personnel record and welcoming them to your company.
  • Do NOT submit a New Hire Request in APi Connect. The Intercompany Transfer Request form is all that is needed to initiate changes to their IT record and email.
  • If they need new access to business systems (AX, WebApps, etc.) please submit those access requests via APi Connect – Software & Access.
